did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Members' lists, letters of dismissal, meetings.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Members' lists (1805-1815, 1816-1820, 1822-1823); letters of dismissal (1804-1818); meetings (1804-1823).
